rules_text:
Dormant {1}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast as long as they share a type with a permanent you control. If Overgrown Construct is a creature, those spells cost {1} less to cast for each permanent of that type you control instead. This effect can't reduce a cost to less than {1}.
